p: Efficacy (i.e., duration of severe neutropenia) was evaluated through CBCs with differential performed pretreatment and on Days 1, 2, and 3 of every cycle. For patients with an ANC ≥1.5 × 10 9/L on Day 3, subsequent CBCs were performed twice weekly. If at any time ANC was <1.5 × 10 9/L, daily CBCs were performed until ANC recovered to ≥1.5 × 10 9/L.
